name: Forest Zombies Run Free - Flick Zombie Temple Attack Game Version 2
name_original: Forest Zombies Run Free - Flick Zombie Temple Attack Game Version 2
description:
Thanks for making Forest Zombies a Top game in over 79 countries worldwide!

Now FREE for a limited time, get it now before the price goes back up!

"Great game" -Brownwood3

"It's fun" - Appl1981

"Time Sucking Fun" - Candice Freedman

"It is the perfect combination between angry birds and plants vs zombies" - So_Fii

"Download all!! This class simply class I'm ecstatic!!" - Оаллала

The above quotes are actual iTunes 5-star reviews from our users

"WARNING! Considered one of the NEWEST Most ADDICTIVE Games!!!"

The FOREST ZOMBIES HAVE ARRIVED and they are HUNGRY FOR INNOCENT SQUIRRELS. Will you be able to help Plummy “The Bunny” McClane and his assistant – “Mushroomers”, the Waffle Brothers in their efforts to stop the Forest Zombies??? Armed with a CATAPULT and an ARRAY OF WEAPONS, help “The Bunny” STOP THE FOREST ZOMBIES. Each level gets more CHALLENGING as more Forest Zombies attack and at a faster rate each time. Destroying Forest Zombies allows you to COLLECT COINS to UPGRADE YOUR WEAPONS and UNLOCK EXCITING NEW LEVELS. A FUN, ENGAGING, game that uses LOGIC and QUICK THINKING you won’t be able to put down.

ARE YOU UP FOR THE CHALLENGE? PROTECT THE SQUIRRELS! DESTROY THE FOREST ZOMBIES BEFORE THEY TAKE OVER!!!!

FEATURES:
• Over 100 CHALLENGING LEVELS.
• Interactive ability to destroy the zombies with all kinds of SURPRISING WEAPONS.
• Fun, INTRIGUING FOREST ZOMBIES that keep coming back for more squirrels.
• ZOM BOOK showing all the cool zombie characters with their descriptions.
• COMIX, the Forest Zombies comic book detailing the story behind Forest Zombies.
• Hours of POWER PACKED ENTERTAINMENT.
• COLLECT COINS to UNLOCK WEAPONS, and ADDITIONAL UNIQUE LEVELS
• NEW WEAPONS cause the ZOMBIES to REACT differently.

Now available for iPhone, iPad and iPod Touch!

See the screenshots for a peek into this EXCITING NEW GAME from Flop Studios!

Enjoy and thanks for your support!



++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
SPECIAL INSTRUCTION NOTES:

*SELECT WEAPONS: ALL WEAPONS MUST BE SELECTED prior to starting the game; You may CUSTOMIZE THE SEQUENCE of the WEAPONS to your playing strategy.

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
